title: Elliptic cylindrical coordinates
summary: Elliptic cylindrical coordinates are a three-dimensional orthogonal coordinate system that results from projecting the two-dimensional elliptic coordinate system in the perpendicular z {\displaystyle z} -direction.  Hence, the coordinate surfaces are prisms of confocal ellipses and hyperbolae.
